WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-EAST COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL 12 AUG
   BY M/V OCEANIC CHAMPION TOWING 12
   9260 METER LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   21-01S 039-29W, 21-00S 038-15W,
   21-15S 038-15W, 21-15S 039-29W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 2336/17.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 13 AUG 17.
